700254f-a.title: Bronx: 180th Street (East) - Bronx Park Avenue
700254f-a.text:
1129 E. 180th Street, north side, between Bronx Park Aueue
and Devoe Avenue, showing the Fire Alarm Headquarters of the
Fire Department. The building is within Bronx Park.
April 16, 1938.
N.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700256f-a.title: Bronx: 180th Street (East) - Bronx Park Avenue
700256f-a.text:
E. 18Oth Street, south side, west of Bronx Park Avenue,
showing a refreshment stand and the elevated structure of the
I. R. T. aubway line.
April 16, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700264f-a.title: Bronx: 180th Street - Park Avenue
700264f-a.text:
180h St. n.w. cor. S Park Ave.
8-31-1942
